data.actual_result: i can only see the first 64 characters of the reason
data.expected_result: i should be able to view the whole ban reason in audit logs
data.short_description: ban reasons with longer than 64 chars don't show in audit logs unless they have multiple lines or spaces before the 64th character
data.steps_to_repro: - click on ban or kick - type anything more than 64 characters as a kick/ban reason without spacing - go to audit log - observe
